org.piwik.sdk

Class TrackerBulkURLProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
      • org.piwik.sdk.TrackerBulkURLProcessor

  • public class TrackerBulkURLProcessor
extends
    Sends json POST request to tracking url http://piwik.example.com/piwik.php with body

    { "requests": [ "?idsite=1&url=http://example.org&action_name=Test bulk log Pageview&rec=1", "?idsite=1&url=http://example.net/test.htm&action_name=Another bul k page view&rec=1" ], "token_auth": "33dc3f2536d3025974cccb4b4d2d98f4" }
